message: [NAME_A] tried to invent a new handshake with [NAME_B], but it turned into a three-minute interpretive wrestling match.
During the talent show, [NAME_A] performed an interpretive dance while [NAME_B] pretended to be a confused mailbox.
[NAME_B] showed up to the picnic with a trombone, and [NAME_A] showed up with a jar of bees; it was an unforgettable duet.
“I thought you said pet rock,” [NAME_A] sighed, staring at the enormous boulder [NAME_B] was walking on a leash.
“Stop shouting at the toaster,” [NAME_A] whispered, but [NAME_B] insisted the appliance owed them an apology.
[NAME_B] mailed a birthday card to [NAME_A], but accidentally addressed it to “The Mysterious Pickle Wizard.”
[NAME_A] tried to teach [NAME_B] how to juggle spaghetti, but all they accomplished was redecorating the ceiling.
When [NAME_A] opened the fridge, they found [NAME_B] inside, calmly eating pudding and claiming it was “their office now.”
[NAME_A] challenged [NAME_B] to a staring contest with a goldfish, and somehow the goldfish won.
[NAME_A] asked [NAME_B] to keep a low profile at the party, so [NAME_B] arrived in stilts and a kazoo hat.
